item.title: Microsoft Magic
item.description: MAGIC #1 An Indian discovered that nobody can create a FOLDER anywhere on the computer which can be named as “CON”. This is something pretty cool… and unbelievable… At Microsoft the whole Team, couldn’t answer why this happened! TRY IT NOW, IT WILL NOT CREATE “CON” FOLDER MAGIC #2 For those of you using Windows, do the following: Open an empty notepad file Type “Bush hid the facts” (without the quotes) Save it as whatever you want.
